name: Destiny Of Memes
description:
You are Death and must kill 3 saturated memes. I'm the one who makes the game. The game is still being made.

the game is in portuguese (for now)

the game has 3 bosses (lack 1) and still has no end (I'll add later)

and without sound

Sorry but the game is too incomplete

style game: boss rush controls:

wdas or arrows to walk space key to attack
